text: Don't Fool with Me (German: Sing, aber spiel nicht mit mir) is a 1963 Austrian musical comedy movie directed by Kurt Nachmann and starring Adrian Hoven, Wera Frydtberg, Karin Heske, Paul HÃ¶rbiger, Peter Vogel, Rex Gildo, Hans Richter, Lou Van Burg, Carmela Corren, Oskar Sima. ==Other websites== * Category:1963 comedy movies Category:1963 musical movies Category:Austrian comedy movies Category:Austrian musical movies Category:Movies directed by Kurt Nachmann Category:Movies set in Vienna
title: Don't Fool with Me
